text: T-pose also know as bind pose or reference pose is the default present/ask/stand in a showy and fake way 3D model before is (full of life and energy/moving) so it can be eaiser for auto weighting.. == Usage == T (showy way of standing/mental attitude) is the default present/ask/stand in a showy and fake way for extremely skinny/skeleton-related animation and it's also used to create extremely skinny/skeleton-related animation for rigs. Sometimes it could be Y-pose present/ask/stand in a showy and fake way upwards or sometimes downwards like A-pose. == References == Category:Animation
